category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 7 (Non-discrimination in employment)
contents: Article 7 (Non-discrimination in employment) ① The Sports Association does not discriminate against employees in hiring, promotion, or training due to race, religion, disability, gender, educational background, age, physical condition, country of origin, region of origin, political opinion, etc. . ② The Sports Council does not unfairly discriminate against non-regular employees. ③ The Athletic Association strives to improve gender-discriminatory systems and practices in hiring, promotion, etc., and to protect female employees’ maternity and achieve work-family balance. [Moved from Article 12, previous Article 7 moved to Article 12 2019. 11. 7.]
